long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple camera App to record videos and take pictures. Enhance your browsing experience with a Camera Chrome Extension. Capture high-quality images and videos directly from your browser with just a click. Whether you need to snap a quick photo or record a video, our extension provides a seamless and convenient way to capture visual content without leaving your favourite websites. Take snapshots, or create engaging video content effortlessly. Unlock the power of photography and videography in your device right in your Chrome browser with this simple and ultra fast Camera Extension.
